name: Pancake
ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour,  tablespoons sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt; set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter (or oil), and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture; whisk until just moistened (do not overmix; a few small lumps are fine).
